definition: The word "lecker" refers to something that has a pleasant taste or flavor. It is commonly used to describe food or beverages that are delicious or tasty.

examples.german: Das Eis schmilzt auf der Zunge und ist richtig lecker.
examples.english: The ice cream melts on the tongue and is really delicious.

examples.german: Die Pizza war lecker und sättigend.
examples.english: The pizza was tasty and filling.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern ein leckeres Stück Kuchen gegessen.
examples.english: I ate a delicious piece of cake yesterday.
